subject: Seneca Open House - April 28th
body:
Open House












Can't see the graphics? View the Web version.












	OPEN
										HOUSE
April 28, 2007
									12:00 pm  - 2:30 pm

Join us on Saturday April 28 from 12:00pm to 2:30pm for Open House events at 6 major Seneca campuses across the GTA. Take this opportunity to see all that Seneca has to offer.
Connect with your education, your passion, your career and your future.
Complete a ballot and bring it to the Open House for
A CHANCE TO WIN GREAT PRIZES!
